name: Rise of the Machines
description:
This game was made  for the Brackys GameJam 2020 2.

The rewind in is the fact you time travel backward so you rewind time.

This was my first ever full 3d game. That is why the models made my me are very bad. My friend made the 3d guns and thank you  PoèMe for making the city possible.  I made the rest of the art myself.  Almost all the scripts are mine besides the controller and enemy chasing you using NavMesh.
